paragraph.heading: 1Introduction
paragraph.paragraph:
Information about usage of threads in ISE Eiffel is contained in the
/libraries/thread/index.xml EiffelThread library documentation. In this section we will only see what is required to
10_compilation.xml enable threading at the level of the compiler options and how to create special type of onces:
20_once_features.xml global once versus once per thread . Users of the EiffelThread library in version 4. 5 and older should read "
